pageProduct.name: SUP Shots Gut Love 8x50ml Vials
pageProduct.description:
General Information

360-degree digestive goodness.

TRUST YOUR GUT
A healthy digestive system (a.k.a gut) essentially helps run the show when it comes to your overall general health and we believe a healthy gut isn't just about Probiotics. It's also about feeding those Probitoics with Prebiotics such as Inulin, Postbiotics and Fruit and Vegetable Extracts for a 360° approach to digestive and overall wellness.

WHY SHOT SUP?
Drink your supplements on-the-go with our super shots. SUP has Prebiotics, Probiotics, Postbiotics, and Apple Cider Vinegar which are said to help:
  • Digestive goodness
  • Digestive vitality
  • A flourishing gut
  • Digestive balance
SHOTSUP

Size: 8x50mL

KEY FEATURES

• Digestive goodness
• Digestive vitality
• A flourishing gut
• Digestive balance
• Shot your vitamins on-the-go

Warnings

Shake before opening. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Store below 25?°C.

Ingredients

Water, Banana enzymes, Lactobacillus plantarum, Apple juice concentrate, Stabiliser (trehalose), Lemon juice, Multi fruits & vegetables enzymes, Kiwifruit enzymes, Inulin, Apple cider vinegar, Flavour (citric acid monohydrate), Natural orange flavour, Natural apple flavour, Natural peach flavour, Chamomile extract, Sweetener (steviol glycoside), Bifidobacterium lactis probiotics.

Directions

SERVING SUGGESTION
SHOT 1 SUP (50mL) for when you want to give your gut some love. Up to 3 weeks supply.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
